issue.title: Publish world state instead of pose per entity for efficiency and reduces visual jitter in GUI

content.raw: Multiple poses are sent per message, but the messages are sent at a higher frequency than the rendering occurs. Would it make sense to throttle the pose message publishing, since the rendering is throttled to 30 Hz? Does anything else subscribe to ~/pose/info?
content.html: Multiple poses are sent per message, but the messages are sent at a higher frequency than the rendering occurs. Would it make sense to throttle the pose message publishing, since the rendering is throttled to 30 Hz? Does anything else subscribe to ~/pose/info?
